product_name: CliniqueChubby Stick Intense Moisturizing Lip Colour Tinted Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Chubby Stick Intense Moisturizing Tinted Lip Balm is a soft cushion of color that's not quite sheer, not quite opaque - just the perfect happy medium.
details: DetailsBenefitsSuper-nourishing tinted balm with sheer-to-moderate coverage and a subtle sheen.Mix and layer them to create your own shades.Easy to use - no mirror required.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Key IngredientsMango and shea butters keep lips feeling comfortably soft and smooth.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2253559How To UseApply tinted lip balm directly to lips. For subtle definition outline lips first, then fill in with natural-looking colour. Never needs sharpening: simply swivel up to reveal more lip colour balm.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Vegetable Oil / Olus / Huile VÃ©gÃ©tale, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera / Cire De Candelilla, Beeswax / Cera Alba / Cire D'Abeille, Ozokerite, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Tocopherol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica, Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Carmine (CI 75470), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply tinted lip balm directly to lips. For subtle definition outline lips first, then fill in with natural-looking colour. Never needs sharpening: simply swivel up to reveal more lip colour balm.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera / Cire De Candelilla

reviews.headline: Quick and Easy
reviews.comments: Very moisturizing and so many colors.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments:
I love Clinique products 
I've been using them since I was 18

reviews.headline: Chubby stick
reviews.comments: Love these easy to use cubbies. I actually leave one in my truck  house and purse

reviews.headline: Great Stuff
reviews.comments: I love these clinque chubby stick lip sticks. I call them crayons. There are lots of colors to choose from. They are creamy & stay on, but not when you eat, I'm ok with that.

reviews.headline: Nourishing
reviews.comments: I have the shades Whole Lotta Honey and Fuller Fig. This lip balm is quite moisturizing and nourishing.

reviews.headline: I love this!
reviews.comments: The texture is great- not gooey, not too soft., but more cole than gloss.  I'll buy it in other colors. Travels in my purse well.

reviews.headline: Love the texture
reviews.comments: Love all cliniqe products

reviews.headline: yes!
reviews.comments: yes yes

reviews.headline: Clinique Chubby Stick
reviews.comments: I love using this product as lipstick and blush! It works great for both! I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Clinique Chubby Stick lip color
reviews.comments: I have used chubby stick lip color for years and will continue to do so until they no longer carry the color I want.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I love everything about this. the packaging is great, I don't have to worry about the lid coming off in my bag like other balms I have. The color is great; it applies easily and evenly without streaking. I love the full color like a lipstick but the comfort and moisture like a balm. I have the Berry color and love that it's versatile and bold but not a nude. The price is great too!

reviews.headline: My go-to lip product!
reviews.comments: Best colored lip gloss/balm. Love the subtle colors.

reviews.headline: Very good lip balm
reviews.comments: I have used Clinique products for years. This lip balm is a great product, one that I can use for everyday use. Very moisturizing.

reviews.headline: tinted chapstick
reviews.comments: it's a tinted chapstick so of course it's not gonna last all day or be a true stain like some reviews mention. as far as tinted chapsticks go, it's my favorite! smooth and easy to use and twist up more. not messy. good amount of color/gloss for a balm

reviews.headline: Clinique chubby stick lip color balm
reviews.comments: Do not like this bc it' barely goes on lips and color so glossy it doesn't show up. Like Vaseline. Sorry I bought it should've just got reg lip gloss has more color to it.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love how smooth it is when applied and the color is very pretty!  I will buy it again!

reviews.headline: Definitely will buy again
reviews.comments: Easy to apply even without a mirror, it's become my go to lip color balm.  True color, wears nice. I prefer the balm or a moisturizing lipstick, they're more comfortable and this didn't cause any lip peeling.

reviews.headline: It's ok, but not exactly what I ordered
reviews.comments: I like Clinique Chubby Sticks, but i have not been able to purchase the particular one that i love.  I received the correct color,  but not the INTENSE  Moisturizing Lip Colour, i only received the regular one.  I am not as happy with it because the color isn't as pronounced, but it's better than nothing.  If it isn't available in what I ordered, they should not offer it.

reviews.headline: No Sharpener
reviews.comments: Needs a sharpener

reviews.headline: Love this lipstick!
reviews.comments: I purchased this color lipstick because it is the closest to the bubblegum pop lipstick I had that Clinique no longer carries.  I love the color and the moisture that it provides.  I just wish it would last longer throughout the day.  I am happy I purchased it!

media.headline: I would buy this product again
Fast Lip Repair For Total Sexyness!!!!
Fast Lip Repair For Total Sexyness!!!!
Fast Lip Repair For Total Sexyness!!!!
I would buy this stick again! Already stocked up.
I want one in every colour
media.caption: I love it

faceoff_positive.comments: My Clinique Beauty Advisor recommended the Fuller Fig shade for my fair skin tone, blue/green eyes, and blonde hair. This product is fantastic for my constantly chapped delicate lips. It subtly moisturizes without making my lips too moist and sticky. And it delivers a soft hint of colour! This product is great and worth every penny! Try it if you are in need of a product that will lightly moisturize and give you a hint of colour that lasts. I highly recommend this balm! I cannot wait to try more colours though!
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect Cold/Cool Weather Lip Balm!

faceoff_negative.comments: When exactly did "caramel" become a shade of pink?! I was expecting a light brown, maybe with a hint of orange in it. Something like the swatch you show on this website. In person, it looks like the swatch you show for Roomiest Rose ... I actually double-checked to see if the wrong pencil had been put in the box! You make good products, Clinique, but your color representations on the website are WAY off. And I've checked them out on multiple monitors. At this point, I won't order anything new until I have time to see it in person at a counter. Unfortunately, I never have time to go to the counter; that's why I buy online!
faceoff_negative.headline: Curviest Caramel? Really?

rollup.name: Chubby Stick Intense Moisturizing Lip Colour Tinted Lip Balm
